testCaseName: Verify that a standard user can mark a task as completed.
name: Verify that a standard user can mark a task as completed.
description: this test case is to verify that a standard user can mark a task as done and it is displayed on [Completed Tasks] section.

steps.name: Click on [Log in] button on Main page

parameters.name: action
parameters.value: Click on [Log in] button on Main page

steps.name: Set on control: [Email] textbox on login page the value: [fhr3@fhr3.com]

parameters.name: action
parameters.value: Set on control: [Email] textbox on login page the value: [fhr3@fhr3.com]

steps.name: Set on control: [Password] textbox on login page the value: [todoistpassword123]

parameters.value: Click on [Last Project] button on Home page Left Side menu

parameters.value: Write on control: [Task name] textbox on Projects main menu (Center page) the value: [task name]
